mean_cn: adj.分开的；独立的；  v.使分开；分割；分配，划分
mean_en: to divide into different parts or groups; to divide things into different parts or groups;  to move apart; to make people or things move apart; to be between two people, areas, countries, etc. so that they are not touching or connected; to stop living together as a couple with your husband, wife or partner
sentence: The couple face to separate directions.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妻朝着不同的方向。
word_etyma: separ分离 + ate形容词后缀具有...的 → separate分离的；个别的
